name: CloudFuze
overview:
At CloudFuze, our vision is to create a universal solution that provides access to any cloud from any device at any time.

Currently, CloudFuze’s platform provides an easy way to consolidate all your Cloud files from Google Drive, Dropbox, Box, SugarSync, and FTP accounts, along with other features that allow users to share and sync their Cloud files. CloudFuze is available for Windows Desktop and Android devices, ensuring that users have access to their cloud files no matter how they choose to connect. There is also a Web App and an iOS App in the works.

CloudFuze also plans to provide the needed control, audit, security and other key features that enterprises demand when dealing with Cloud files.
